name: Buy Back Report
query:
SELECT
    t.customer            AS "Customer Name::150",
    t.email_id            AS "Email ID::150",
    t.phone_no            AS "Contact No",
    t.item_name           AS "Buy Back Item Name::150",
    
    t.basic_price         AS "Buy Back Basic Price",
    t.estimated_price     AS "Recommanded Price::150",
    t.offered_price       AS "Offered Price::150",
    (t.estimated_price-t.offered_price) as "Price Difference::150",
    t.customer_acceptance AS "Customer Acceptance",
     DATE(t.creation)           AS "Creation Date",
    DATE(pr.pin_expiry)               AS "PIN Expiry",
    t.modified_by                        AS "MPO::150",
    pr.modified_by                       AS "Collection Officer::150",
    prt.warehouse       AS "Location::150"
FROM
    `tabBuy Back Requisition` t
left join    `tabPurchase Receipt` pr on pr.buy_back_requisition_ref=t.name
left join `tabPurchase Receipt Item`  prt on prt.parent=pr.name
ORDER BY
  DATE(t.creation) desc
